bookName: Head First Java by Kathy Sierra & Bert Bates
author: Kathy Sierra
pros: engaging storytelling, great illustrations, and real-life explanations
Cons: sometimes the puzzles are a bit confusing

bookName: Beginning Programming with Java For Dummies
author: Barry Burd
Cons: nothing more than a plain introduction in Java

author: Nathan Clark
Cons: there’s no profound explanation of the Object Oriented Programming concept

author: Herbert Schildt
pros: a plain tone of voice, self-testing
Cons: you need at least a small prior understanding of programming
